title: Steal Brainrot Online
description: Steal Brainrot Online is a fast-paced, casual heist game where you collect rare Brainrot memes like Tralalero Tralala and Cappuccino Assassino, straight from the popularItalian Brainrot Clicker Game. You can buy Braintorts from the red carpet, sneak into other playersâ€™ bases to steal theirs, and protect your own with traps and locks. Use boosters, outbid opponents during deliveries, and rebirth for bigger rewards as you climb the leaderboard.
